nodes.bodyText: not sure it is enough or not here, because we can select several nodes, but here it only try to clean the lib folder for the first selected node.
We can build 1 route only at a time so this object should contain only 1 element.
not sure whether we should add Nullable check here
CorePlugin.getDefault().getRunProcessService is used without null check across 7.0.1 patch branch
sorry, maybe I didn't describe clearly, I mean check Nullable of talendProcessJavaProject
@cmeng-talend the issue was fixed could you please confirm it's fixed? Thanks.
